high_descs: Turn left, move around the bed to the left, face the pillow on the side of the bed.
Pick up the pillow on the bed.
Turn around, bring the pillow to the lamp on the table.
Turn on the lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow in the light of the lamp.

high_descs: turn left, walk past bed, turn left, take a few steps, turn left to face the bed
pick up the blue pillow that is on the bed
turn around, walk forward to the desk
anns.task_desc: examine the pillow with a lamp

high_descs: Move across the room to the side of the bed facing the blue pillow on the bed
Pick up the blue pillow on the bed
carry the blue pillow to the small desk to the left of the large desk
Turn on the lamp on top of the desk
anns.task_desc: Carry a blue pillow while turning on a lamp
